Uses of Class
org.mongodb.morphia.query.BucketOptions

  • Packages that use BucketOptions 
    Package Description
    org.mongodb.morphia.query  
    xyz.morphia.aggregation  

    • Uses of BucketOptions in org.mongodb.morphia.query

      Methods in org.mongodb.morphia.query that return BucketOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BucketOptions BucketOptions.OutputOperation.addToSet(String field)
      Returns an array of all unique values that results from applying an expression to each document in a group of documents that share the same group by key.
      BucketOptions BucketOptions.OutputOperation.average(String field)
      Returns the average value of the numeric values that result from applying a specified expression to each document in a group of documents that share the same group by key.
      BucketOptions BucketOptions.defaultField(Object defaultField)
      Define default field for the bucket stage
      BucketOptions BucketOptions.OutputOperation.sum(Object field)
      Calculates and returns the sum of all the numeric values that result from applying a specified expression to each document in a group of documents that share the same group by key.

    • Uses of BucketOptions in xyz.morphia.aggregation

      Methods in xyz.morphia.aggregation with parameters of type BucketOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AggregationPipeline AggregationPipelineImpl.bucket(String field, List<?> boundaries, BucketOptions options) 
      AggregationPipeline AggregationPipeline.bucket(String field, List<?> boundaries, BucketOptions options)
      Categorizes incoming documents into groups, called buckets, based on a specified expression and bucket boundaries.
